Label: CANOPUS Meridian Photometer Array, Key Parameters - J. Samson (U. Alberta)

VariableDescription.Name: i_max
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Brightest Intensity from Geodetic Lat 46-67, Long=265
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******

#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Ionospheric Science

#     TEXT                            Station Status, Merged Scaled 5577A Scans and Peak Intensity
#                                     Merged Scans>from 3 stations along constant Geodetic Long. of 265, from Lat.                           
#                                      46 to 67                                                                                              
#                                     References: 1.Rostoker, G., Samson, J.C., Creutzberg, F., Hughes, T.J.,
#                                     McDiarmid, D.R., McNamara, A.G., Vallance Jones, A., Wallis, D.D.,

#                                     high latitude ionosphere during the ISTP/GGS program,
#                                     Space Sci. Rev., submitted for publication, 1993.
#                                     2.Samson, J.C., Lyons, L.R., Newell, P.T., Creutzberg, F. and
#                                     Xu, B., Proton aurora substorm intensifications, Geophys. Res. Letters,
#                                     19, 2167, 1992. 3.Samson, J.C., Hughes, T.J., Creutzberg, F.,
#                                     Wallis, D.D., Greenwald, R.A. and Ruohoniemi, J.M.,
#                                     Observations of a detached discrete arc in association with
#                                     field line resonances, J. Geophys. Res., 96, 15, 683, 1991.
#     MODS                            Created 18-DEC-1994

#     PI_NAME                         J. Samson

#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ground-Based VLF/ELF/ULF, Photometers
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              CANOPUS_MPA_Key-Parameters-K0_1min_cdf
#

#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered
#  2. Brightest Intensity from Geodetic Lat 46-67, Long=265
